title: New Dawn
description: For our third release Hentamine presents 'New Dawn'. A collection of apocalyptic themed tracks that highlight the mindset of an individual caught in an unforgiving new world.
longDescription:
Preview the asset here;

https://soundcloud.com/hentamine/sets/new-dawn


For our third release Hentamine presents 'New Dawn'. A collection of apocalyptic themed tracks that highlight the mindset of an individual caught in an unforgiving new world.


'New Dawn' consists of multiple pieces composed and recorded on acoustic guitar, with synthesiser and drone backing, to bring you a variety of intricate arrangements that invoke emotions of despair, tragedy but also gleaming moments of hope.


TRACKLIST

  1. Prelude
  2. New Dawn
  3. Barren
  4. Aftermath
  5. Aftermath (postlude)
  6. Hunted
  7. Welcome, Stranger
  8. Reflections
  9. Gunsligner
  10. Homesick
  11. Badlands
  12. Moonshine
  13. Lonsome Traveller
  14. Campfire
  15. Memories (prelude)
  16. Memories
technicalDetails:
